awd_titl_txt: Research Initiation Award: Active Excitement of Three-      Dimensional Layers
awd_abstract_narration: An experimental investigation is to be conducted, under a                       Research Initiation Award, of the mixing layer between two                      parallel streams at supersonic speeds.  Optical non-intrusive                   diagnostics and pressure measurements will be used to infer                     the effectiveness of mixing and the role of shock waves.  A                     coordinated computational effort, based on large-eddy                           simulation, will also be carried out.                                                                                                                           Mixing between parallel streams at very high speeds is                          essential for the operation of advanced propulsion systems and                  the understanding of the organized turbulent flow features                      that control the mixing which is necessary for combustion.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: REU SUPP-Res Exp for Ugrd Supp
